name: Plans / Specs followed and correct type of timber used
All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached/commented

Soffit framing is installed at correct centres

Any bracing elements completed to design specification

Soffit Framing and Villaboard completed correctly within specified tolerance, checked and approved
Area finished - left clean and tidy
Plans / Specs followed and correct type of paper/wraps used
All Flashing Tape installed as per manuel
All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
Number of screws for doors correct
Fireseal around door installed as per spec if needed
Door is fully operational after installation
Door jambs are plumb and level
Door gap around door leaf within tolerance
Structural Steel QA received and correct
DPC installed, checked and correct as per specification

Fixings and hold down bolts checked and correct
All openings (doors / windows etc) checked, correct and approved
Deflection heads type installed and correct / Track locks
Wall checked (straight and plumb) and within tolerance
All relevant nogs (service and special/fixtures) installed, checked and correct
All other nogs checked and approved
All Wall framing checks completed & Inspections carried out
All above QA completed and relevant information attached
Has the plasterer left area cleaned, tidy and removed all plaster dags off wall ready to receive architraves/skirtings?
Are the architraves/skirtings match size and profile as per drawing or contract?
Have the skirting board been properly scribed, sanded, glued and mitred and square at external corners?
Have all the architraves/skirtings been installed with consistent even margin?
